attributes.action: abandon the proposed 50p phone line levy to enable broadband services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposed levy of £6 per annum to all households having a fixed phone landline in order to benefit Broadband users is a tax by any other name. The levy is unfair especially to the aged and those who have no interest whatsoever in Broadband services. The Broadband providers should foot the bill themselves,not the public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
